Uses of Class
Model.Product

Packages that use Product 
Package Description
BusinessLogicLayer.Validate  
DataAccessLayer  

  • Uses of Product in BusinessLogicLayer.Validate

    Methods in BusinessLogicLayer.Validate with parameters of type Product 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ProductValidator.validate​(Product product)
    The method validates an object of type Product: it verifies that its quantity field or its price field are not less than or equal than 0.

  • Uses of Product in DataAccessLayer

    Methods in DataAccessLayer that return Product 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Product ProductDAO.findByName​(java.lang.String name)
    Method to find a Product from a table using the name field.
